head.title: Add Metadata to {{FileFormatUp}} Files in {{ProgLang}} Applications
head.description: {{ProgLang}} metadata processing API to add metadata information to {{FileFormatUp}} files. Work with metadata standards XMP, EXIF, IPTC, ID3 etc

header.title: Adding Metadata To {{FileFormatUp}} In {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Add custom metadata properties to a wide range of business documents, images, audio & video file formats using {{ProdFullName}} API
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) offers an advanced set of metadata management and manipulation features, allowing {{EnvName}} programmers to easily view, edit, delete, find, compare, swap and export metadata information from images and document formats without using any external software. Add metadata details to PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, OneNote, Visio, Project, AutoCAD, Archive and Multimedia file formats with additional support to perform metadata operations on any {{ProdShortName}}-based applications with true flexibility

formats.title: Adding Metadata Properties To Other File Formats
formats.description: Multi format documents and images metadata addition API for {{ProdShortName}}. Retrieve metadata of some of the popular file formats as stated below.

examples.comment_1: Initialize a new {{TextSignature}} instance with the document
examples.comment_2: Utilize {{QrCodeSignOptions}} to embed a QR-Code into the document
examples.comment_3: Specify the signature type and designate its position on the page
examples.comment_4: Persist the document with the integrated QR-Code

steps.title: Procedure to Generate and Embed a QR-Code on {{FileFormatUp}} Pages

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) facilitates the generation of QR-Codes in various popular formats and their placement on {{FileFormatUp}} pages. Supporting over 10 types of QR-Codes, our library can be seamlessly integrated into {{EnvName}} applications. Enhance your documents with QR-Code signatures using our product.
content.step_1: Acquire the {{FileFormatUp}} file or stream to be signed with a QR-Code.
content.step_3: Customize visual parameters such as color, position, size, etc.
content.step_4: Persist the document with the embedded QR-Code.

more_features.title: Document Metadata Management
more_features.description: Our robust API simplifies the management of document metadata. Seamlessly access, edit, and manipulate a variety of document properties to enhance organization and searchability.

feature_1.title: Metadata Control
feature_1.content: Easily retrieve and process metadata from documents. Gain valuable insights into properties such as author, creation date, and more.

feature_2.title: Metadata Editing
feature_2.content: Directly modify document metadata. Update properties to improve organization, boost searchability, and ensure accurate information.

feature_3.title: Advanced Metadata Management
feature_3.content: Execute complex operations on document metadata. Efficiently add custom properties, remove unnecessary data, and maintain data consistency.

code_1.title: How to Customize a Generated QR-Code
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to place a customized QR-Code on a {{FileFormatUp}} page.
code_1.comment_1: Retrieve the document to be signed and pass it to {{TextSignature}}
code_1.comment_2: Configure QR-Code options with the necessary text
code_1.comment_3: Designate the relative position of the QR-Code on the page
code_1.comment_6: Define the font options for the message
code_1.comment_7: Customize the QR-Code background color and brush
code_1.comment_8: Embed the QR-Code into the document
